startUrl.title: Direct Search URL (Recommended)
startUrl.description: Paste a CareerBuilder search URL from your browser. This is the most reliable method.

keyword.title: OR Search by Keywords
keyword.description: Job titles or keywords (e.g., 'Software Engineer'). Leave empty if using Direct URL above.

location.title: Location
location.description: City, state, or zip code (e.g., 'New York, NY')

results_wanted.title: Number of Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape

cookies.title: Browser Cookies (Optional)
cookies.description: Copy cookies from your browser to bypass blocking. Format: 'name1=value1; name2=value2'

cookiesJson.title: OR Cookies as JSON (Optional)
cookiesJson.description: Cookies in JSON format (array or object)

mode.title: Mode (API first)
mode.description: preferApi tries API, falls back to HTML; apiOnly skips HTML; htmlOnly skips API.

searchApiUrl.title: Custom Search API URL (optional)
searchApiUrl.description: Override the detected API endpoint. Leave empty to use built-in candidates.

apiPageSize.title: API Page Size
apiPageSize.description: Number of jobs to request per API page (if supported by the endpoint).

apiHeaders.title: API Headers (JSON)
apiHeaders.description: Optional JSON object of headers to include in API requests (e.g. auth or special cookies).

apiExtraParams.title: API Extra Params (JSON)
apiExtraParams.description: Optional JSON object of extra query params for the API (e.g. sorting, facets).
